name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, biomusicologist, riotdejaneiro, equinn2006, Jeet, LexSenthur, havenless)

name: djwhiterabbit
text: maybe that's just his chuckle material.  as he says, he's trying to get into the listener's head.  (^ ^,)

name: zapatos
text:
Just because he is gay doesn't mean he can't have a girlfriend.

He has to kill her though.

name: neruka
text:
He's a robot. He could be, like, 11 years old right now.

But yeah.

name: zem
text: Or maybe he doesn't even have a girlfriend and it's all for the sake of chuckles

name: alejandroadam
text: no that would make too much sense

name: roastbeet
text: It's clearly all for the sake of getting inside your head. Apparently successful!

name: spectre
text: It disturbs me that "getting into Lie Bot's head" involves murder. Hmm. Since everybody always believes, him, you realize Lie Bot COULD get away with murder. Eww.

name: jhunter
text: A comment left by jhunter was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by BPMead, yaysayer, Omegatron)

name: ted0phile
text: ...What?

name: jhunter
text: I think I was trying to communicate the fact that gay dudes only think in chinese? I won't defend this decision. I'll file it under marijuana related hijinks. Highjinks.

name: hannah
text: "working rough chuckles" has entered the lexicon of me and my dumb friends.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Oh man, I'm always working the rough chuckles!

name: chaesar
text:
"rough chuckles" makes me think of puking

i.e. "Scott had too many pina coladas, he rough chuckled white nectar all over the interior of Tracy's Escalade."

name: hannah
text: oh, oh man. that is too rich. that's better than technicolour yawn. that's a keeper. :)

name: korukyu
text: That one needs to be in Urban Dictionary. Seriously.

name: spinynorman
text: Consider that added to my personal lexicon.

name: lucid
text: I always felt there was something more to rough chuckles that I wasn't seeing, and you have opened my eyes. Chubby for you, sir.

name: a_dude
text: since this one we havent seen chucklebot in awhile.

name: sargasm
text: Nervous chuckles are still chuckles, people!

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Tomorrow: Vlad, the make-out king"

name: honesttom
text: I use the phrase "rough chuckles" all the time. Chucklebot is fantastic - the font just makes everything he says hilarious.

name: letterswewrote
text: i've found this to be the case as well.

name: randyjohnson
text:
I think chucklebot is one of my favorite characters is because I also work some rough chuckles at parties

but I just love people's reactions

name: molesticide
text: i like the frozen greeting his arms are, apparently, always in.

name: dtuba
text: "I can't put my arms down!"

name: deusoma
text: Anyone else noticing Lie Bot not lying to the other robots?

name: i_love_kate
text:
I was just about to point that out. Damn you, Deusoma, and your epileptic fit-inducing avatar of Hugh-Laurity!

(That was an amalgamation of the name "Hugh Laurie" and "Hilarity".)

name: quarantine
text: Rough chuckles!

name: notcool
text: Working in the hospital gig, I live a lot of rough chuckles. Rough chuckles indeed.

name: nyu
text: One time my rugby coach left the came with the parting words "Alright boys, Im gonna go beat my wife." He was not joking. The man got in his car.

name: farqussus
text: I chubby spousal abuse.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Well, I'm sure that's how he gets his on, so no harm.

Wait. A lot of harm... that isn't at all funny, never mind.

name: tekende
text: It is best to be well-rested on the day you are going to kill your girlfriend.
